error.e400: One or more invalid parameters were specified.
error.e401: You have insufficient permissions to access this resource.
error.e403: You don't have permission to access this resource.
error.e404: The requested resource could not be found.
error.e409: The request could not be completed due to a conflict with the current state of the resource.
error.e429: You have exceeded the rate limit for this resource.
log_id.uuid: The log ID must be a valid uuid.
log_id.exists: The log with the given ID was not found.
page.integer: The page must be an integer.
limit.integer: The limit must be an integer.
invalid_search_column: Not able to search with the given parameters.

expires_at.date: The expiry date must be a valid date.

permissions.array: The permissions must be an array.

ip_rule.enum: The IP rule must be a valid type.
ip_range.required_if: The IP range is required when the IP rule is 1 or 2.

ip_range.*.ip: The IP range must be a valid IP address.
country_rule.enum: The country rule must be a valid type.
country_range.required_if: The country range is required when the country rule is 1 or 2.

country_range.*.required_if: The country range item must be a valid country short name.
disable_logging.boolean: The disable logging must be a boolean.
hmac_token.max: HMAC token must be less than 255 characters.
